AcknowledgeJob.name: AcknowledgeJob
AcknowledgeJob.description:
Grants permission to view information about a specified job and whether that job has
                                                been received by the job worker

AcknowledgeThirdPartyJob.name: AcknowledgeThirdPartyJob
AcknowledgeThirdPartyJob.description:
Grants permission to confirm that a job worker has received the specified job (partner
                                                actions only)

CreateCustomActionType.name: CreateCustomActionType
CreateCustomActionType.description:
Grants permission to create a custom action that you can use in the pipelines associated
                                                with your AWS account

CreatePipeline.name: CreatePipeline
CreatePipeline.description: Grants permission to create a uniquely named pipeline

DeleteCustomActionType.name: DeleteCustomActionType
DeleteCustomActionType.description: Grants permission to delete a custom action

DeletePipeline.name: DeletePipeline
DeletePipeline.description: Grants permission to delete a specified pipeline

DeleteWebhook.name: DeleteWebhook
DeleteWebhook.description: Grants permission to delete a specified webhook

DeregisterWebhookWithThirdParty.name: DeregisterWebhookWithThirdParty
DeregisterWebhookWithThirdParty.description:
Grants permission to remove the registration of a webhook with the third party specified
                                                in its configuration

DisableStageTransition.name: DisableStageTransition
DisableStageTransition.description: Grants permission to prevent revisions from transitioning to the next stage in a pipeline

EnableStageTransition.name: EnableStageTransition
EnableStageTransition.description: Grants permission to allow revisions to transition to the next stage in a pipeline

GetJobDetails.name: GetJobDetails
GetJobDetails.description: Grants permission to view information about a job (custom actions only)

GetPipeline.name: GetPipeline
GetPipeline.description: Grants permission to retrieve information about a pipeline structure

GetPipelineExecution.name: GetPipelineExecution
GetPipelineExecution.description:
Grants permission to view information about an execution of a pipeline, including
                                                details about artifacts, the pipeline execution ID, and the name, version, and status
                                                of the pipeline

GetPipelineState.name: GetPipelineState
GetPipelineState.description:
Grants permission to view information about the current state of the stages and actions
                                                of a pipeline

GetThirdPartyJobDetails.name: GetThirdPartyJobDetails
GetThirdPartyJobDetails.description:
Grants permission to view the details of a job for a third-party action (partner actions
                                                only)

ListActionExecutions.name: ListActionExecutions
ListActionExecutions.description: Grants permission to list the action executions that have occurred in a pipeline

ListActionTypes.name: ListActionTypes
ListActionTypes.description:
Grants permission to list a summary of all the action types available for pipelines
                                                in your account

ListPipelineExecutions.name: ListPipelineExecutions
ListPipelineExecutions.description: Grants permission to list a summary of the most recent executions for a pipeline

ListPipelines.name: ListPipelines
ListPipelines.description:
Grants permission to list a summary of all the pipelines associated with your AWS
                                                account

ListTagsForResource.name: ListTagsForResource
ListTagsForResource.description: Grants permission to list tags for a CodePipeline resource

ListWebhooks.name: ListWebhooks
ListWebhooks.description: Grants permission to list all of the webhooks associated with your AWS account

PollForJobs.name: PollForJobs
PollForJobs.description: Grants permission to view information about any jobs for CodePipeline to act on

PollForThirdPartyJobs.name: PollForThirdPartyJobs
PollForThirdPartyJobs.description:
Grants permission to determine whether there are any third-party jobs for a job worker
                                                to act on (partner actions only)

PutActionRevision.name: PutActionRevision
PutActionRevision.description: Grants permission to edit actions in a pipeline

PutApprovalResult.name: PutApprovalResult
PutApprovalResult.description:
Grants permission to provide a response (Approved or Rejected) to a manual approval
                                                request in CodePipeline

PutJobFailureResult.name: PutJobFailureResult
PutJobFailureResult.description:
Grants permission to represent the failure of a job as returned to the pipeline by
                                                a job worker (custom actions only)

PutJobSuccessResult.name: PutJobSuccessResult
PutJobSuccessResult.description:
Grants permission to represent the success of a job as returned to the pipeline by
                                                a job worker (custom actions only)

PutThirdPartyJobFailureResult.name: PutThirdPartyJobFailureResult
PutThirdPartyJobFailureResult.description:
Grants permission to represent the failure of a third-party job as returned to the
                                                pipeline by a job worker (partner actions only)

PutThirdPartyJobSuccessResult.name: PutThirdPartyJobSuccessResult
PutThirdPartyJobSuccessResult.description:
Grants permission to represent the success of a third-party job as returned to the
                                                pipeline by a job worker (partner actions only)

PutWebhook.name: PutWebhook
PutWebhook.description: Grants permission to create or update a webhook

RegisterWebhookWithThirdParty.name: RegisterWebhookWithThirdParty
RegisterWebhookWithThirdParty.description: Grants permission to register a webhook with the third party specified in its configuration

RetryStageExecution.name: RetryStageExecution
RetryStageExecution.description:
Grants permission to resume the pipeline execution by retrying the last failed actions
                                                in a stage

StartPipelineExecution.name: StartPipelineExecution
StartPipelineExecution.description: Grants permission to run the most recent revision through the pipeline

StopPipelineExecution.name: StopPipelineExecution
StopPipelineExecution.description: Grants permission to stop an in-progress pipeline execution

TagResource.name: TagResource
TagResource.description: Grants permission to tag a CodePipeline resource

UntagResource.name: UntagResource
UntagResource.description: Grants permission to remove a tag from a CodePipeline resource

UpdatePipeline.name: UpdatePipeline
UpdatePipeline.description: Grants permission to update a pipeline with changes to the structure of the pipeline
